articles.title: Atlanta Braves sign Matt Olson to 8-year, $168 million deal through 2029 season - ESPN
articles.description: The Atlanta Braves have signed newly acquired first baseman Matt Olson to an eight-year, $168 million deal that runs through the 2029 season, it was announced Tuesday.
articles.content: NORTH PORT, Florida -- The first call from a general manager to a newly acquired player is usually perfunctory, a simple welcome. But when Atlanta Braves GM Alex Anthopoulos phoned Matt Olson on Mond… [+4157 chars]

articles.description: The Jaguars outrageous deal with Christian Kirk will make Deebo Samuel more expensive
articles.content: Good luck negotiating with Deebo Samuel now!

articles.author: Martin Frank, The News Journal
articles.title: Delaware native Bones Hyland buries Sixers, then gets emotional over escaping fatal fire - The News Journal
articles.description: Wilmington native Nah'Shon 'Bones' Hyland, a rookie with the Denver Nuggets, explains why playing the Sixers meant so much to him.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA – Maybe now we know why this game against the 76ers meant so much to Bones Hyland.
It wasn't so much the four 3-point shots Hyland hit in the fourth quarter, including three in a row du… [+6394 chars]
